name: politico
text: A probe by the Department of Investigation has found that the NYPD’s aggressive response to protests after the death of George Floyd heightened tensions and undermined public trust in the ability of the police to protect the rights of citizens https://t.co/m0oeUmPU07

name: politico
text:
The Senate approved a two-day spending bill to avert a government shutdown, kicking the deadline for a year-end spending agreement and Covid stimulus package to Sunday evening
https://t.co/LpTXESKMq1

name: politico
text:
Ron Johnson is rolling out a bold platform as he weighs whether to run for reelection: He's the guy who twice shut down $1,200 stimulus checks that would have gone to hundreds of thousands of his constituents.
https://t.co/6DdeEQvGl7

name: politico
text:
The FDA has authorized Moderna's coronavirus vaccine for emergency use — the second to clear that bar in the United States 
https://t.co/FZ8EFgEwqq
